title: Activity-Based Technology Education Design for Urban Youth

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer application skills and general understanding of scientific fields
context.additional_context: After-school technology education program for office/administrative working learners, offering project-based learning environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Design at least one technology-based prototype solving everyday problems within 8 weeks
Collaborate with peers using collaboration tools to plan and execute technology projects at least three times
Analyze ethical issues arising during technology utilization and submit at least one report proposing alternatives
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
